data.Sentence_cn: 在一次斗牛时，一个醉汉突然溜达到斗牛场中间，
data.Sentence: During a bullfight, a drunk suddenly wandered into the middle of the ring.

data.Sentence_cn: 人们开始大叫起来，但醉汉却没有意识到危险。
data.Sentence: The crowd began to shout, but the drunk was unaware of the danger.

data.Sentence_cn: 当时那公牛正忙于对付斗牛士，
data.Sentence: The bull was busy with the matador at the time,

data.Sentence_cn: 但突然它看见了醉汉，只见他正大声说着粗鲁的话，手里挥动着一顶红帽子。
data.Sentence: but it suddenly caught sight of the drunk who was shouting rude remarks and waving a red cap.

data.Sentence_cn: 对挑衅显然非常敏感的公牛完全撇开斗牛士，直奔醉汉而来。
data.Sentence: Apparently sensitive to criticism, the bull forgot all about the matador and charged at the drunk.

data.Sentence_cn: 可这醉汉像是很有把握似的。
data.Sentence: The drunk, however, seemed quite sure of himself.

data.Sentence_cn: 当公牛逼近他时，他踉跄地住旁边一闪，牛扑空了。
data.Sentence: When the bull got close to him, he clumsily stepped aside to let it pass.

data.Sentence_cn: 观众欢呼起来，醉汉向人们鞠躬致谢。
data.Sentence: The crowd broke into cheers and the drunk bowed.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而，此时已有3个人进入斗牛场，迅速把醉汉拉到安全的地方。
data.Sentence: By this time, however, three men had come into the ring and they quickly dragged the drunk to safety.

data.Sentence_cn: 好像连牛也在为他感到遗憾，
data.Sentence: Even the bull seemed to feel sorry for him,

data.Sentence_cn: 因为它一直同情地看着醉汉，直到他的背影消逝，才重新将注意力转向斗牛士。
data.Sentence: for it looked on sympathetically until the drunk was out of the way before once more turning its attention to the matador.
